snippet: The 2001 resolution, enacted after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks, has outlived its purpose and become the basis for perpetual war.
abstract: Editorial calls for repeal of 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force; contends law became basis for vast overreaching of power for former Pres George W Bush and is basis for confusion over targeted killing policy adopted by Pres Obama; holds authorization has outlived its purpose and is being used to justify perpetual war.
lead_paragraph: The 2001 resolution, enacted after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks, has outlived its purpose and become the basis for perpetual war.

headline.seo: Repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Law

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
